title: 4 application pages needed for manufacturing pollutant collection
snippet:
We need a pages for the following:

1. Capturing Welding Smoke/Fumes
2. Grinding & Deburring Wastes
3. Laser and Plasma Cutting smoke/fumes
4. Explosive dusts

We have products that address these issues and would like them featured in each of the pages.  In addition, we can supply videos and some other resource information, but we would need unique content on these pages of roughly 500-700 words that should be optimized for search engines.

Message me for more information.

Matt
